projectGridLines.title: Project detials given in Description
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title: Design and development of independent suspension for mining truck


Description: Project involves finding latest technologies in this area and implementation of

the same, complete design, analysis of independent suspension for better ride & comfort,

K&C evaluation and strength & durability for road loads.

Skill sets: Vehicle dynamics, Tools – Motionsolve

Traits expectation: Strong technical fundamentals, pro-active, innovative mindset

Expected learning: design of suspension systems

Specific courses required for project execution: Vehicle dynamics, structural mechanics, vibrations


Project 2 Title: Heat treatment distortion prediction for gears


Description: Project involves evaluation of distortion during heat treatment process using numerical

methods. It involves numerical modeling of phase transformation and comparison of distortion with

actual parts which are heat treated.

Skill sets: FEA, Basics of heat treatment, Tools – Ansys /Abaqus

Traits expectation: Strong technical fundamentals, pro-active, innovative mindset

Expected learning: Simulation of manufacturing methods like heat treatment

Specific courses required for project execution: Metallurgy, FEA, Numerical methods

Project 3 Title: Design and development of shifting mechanism for multi speed transmission

Description: To design auto shifting mechanism for 2 speed transmission for electric 3W

Skill sets: Matlab, Simulink, Mechatronics,

Traits expectation: Strong technical fundamentals, pro-active, innovative mindset

Expected learning: Design of shifting systems

Specific courses required for project execution: Control systems, Mechatronics

Project 4 Title: Engineering design process automation using VB script in Excel

Description: To align with IATF/ISO design process requirements

Skill sets: Engineering design process, VB

Traits expectation: Strong technical fundamentals, pro-active, innovative mindset

Expected learning: Automation of engineering processes

Specific courses required for project execution: Programming, Product development process


Project 5 Title: Laser welding of two components – Design, simulation, testing


Description: To design laser welded differential

Skill sets: New joining technology, FEA, heat transfer

Traits expectation: Strong technical fundamentals, pro-active, innovative mindset

Expected learning: New manufacturing technologies

Specific courses required for project execution: FEA, Manufacturing technology, Metallurgy
